nodes.excerpt: In the information age, access to global networking is a basic human right. We made the Abacus because the world deserves an affordable & biodegradable PC that is made with the same care and craftsmanship as a Mac.

nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 在信息时代，使用全球网络是一项基本人权。我们制造算盘是因为这个世界理应拥有一台价格合理、可生物降解的PC，它的制造工艺和工艺与Mac一样。
localize.tagline: 价格实惠、可生物降解的PC

localize.description: 在信息時代，使用全球網絡是一項基本人權。我們製造算盤是因爲這個世界理應擁有一臺價格合理、可生物降解的PC，它的製造工藝和工藝與Mac一樣。
localize.tagline: 價格實惠、可生物降解的PC

nodes.excerpt: Ever spent hours training ML models only to have them crash and burn in production? ZenML is here to help. Track metadata, compare results, and scale to the cloud. It’s open-source, extensible, and integrates with battle-tested MLOps tooling off-the-shelf.
nodes.title: ZenML - Create reproducible machine learning pipelines
nodes.author: David Aronchick

localize.description: 有没有花了几个小时训练ML模型，结果却让它们在生产中崩溃和烧毁？ZenML在这里提供帮助。跟踪元数据、比较结果并扩展到云。它是开源的、可扩展的，并且与现成的久经考验的MLOPS工具集成在一起。
localize.tagline: 创建可重现的机器学习管道

localize.description: 有沒有花了幾個小時訓練ML模型，結果卻讓它們在生產中崩潰和燒燬？ZenML在這裏提供幫助。跟蹤元數據、比較結果並擴展到雲。它是開源的、可擴展的，並且與現成的久經考驗的MLOPS工具集成在一起。
localize.tagline: 創建可重現的機器學習管道

nodes.excerpt: Help your friends get a job by embedding a widget on your website where you point visitors to your friends for jobs that you're not available for. Create your widget in the online generator and embed it on your website using an iframe. It's as simple as that.

nodes.author: Albin Groen

localize.tagline: 毫不费力地推荐你的朋友找工作

nodes.excerpt: Malist – simple browser extension that takes your email book to a browser. Whenever you need somebody's email, simply click the button in the toolbar and get the email. No more need to ask for an email over and over again or to search in the contact book.

nodes.title: Fuckin' Kill It Calendar 2021 edition - Calendar that helps you get shit done
nodes.author: Sachin

localize.description: 该死的杀死它的日历是一个以证据为基础的激励和生产力工具，旨在迫使你每天完成一项任务。“他妈的杀了它日历”旨在通过强迫你每天完成一项任务来打破你的拖延症习惯
localize.tagline: 帮助你完成垃圾任务的日历

localize.description: 該死的殺死它的日曆是一個以證據爲基礎的激勵和生產力工具，旨在迫使你每天完成一項任務。“他媽的殺了它日曆”旨在通過強迫你每天完成一項任務來打破你的拖延症習慣
localize.tagline: 幫助你完成垃圾任務的日曆
